ygData.subject: Re: New to this forum....Infravision goggles
ygData.msgSnippet: I have also seen these.. and in Beta i was approached (i was a gnome wizard) and asked to make the infravision goggles out of these lens... The person said
ygData.messageBody:
I have also seen these.. and in Beta i was approached (i was a gnome wizard) and asked to make the infravision goggles out of these lens... The person said that they were a required component which he found out through a quest or something.. however tinkering was not yet fully implimented so i was unable to do this. I should have followed up on it more though.... :(

>"They are called the "Lens of
>Glowing Amber" Which makes me pretty much think that they are definately the
>first component. And they are dropped by a froglock summoner in upper guk.
>Personally I am not high enough to go find these myself yet..So have not
>personally seen one but have seen various posts enough to know that they do
>exist..except people don't know what to do with them. And I am sure this is
>a rare drop because you just don't see those over the auction channels
>everyday..;)
>
>Shokakon
>Gnome Necromancer of Tunare
